wikipedia_page.main: Frances Donovan is a journalist and presenter who has anchored television and radio programmes across major events for both the BBC and ITV, including the Rugby World Cup, the Olympics, the Commonwealth Games and the BAFTAS.

response: Many people contributed to the writing, performing and production of the short films and links that made up the show. Several BBC Wales presenters made "tongue-in-cheek" cameo appearances in the series, including Jamie Owen, Oliver Hides, Frances Donovan, and Jason Mohammad.
